hymn.title: Jesus, my Lord, to Thee I cry

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, my Lord, to Thee I cry; Un -- less Thou save me, I must die: Oh, bring Thy free sal -- va -- tion nigh, And take me as I am! And take me as I am! And take me as I am! My on -- ly plea— Christ died for me! Oh, take me as I am!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus, my Lord, to Thee I cry; Unless Thou save me, I must die: Oh, bring Thy free salvation nigh, And take me as I am!
And take me as I am! And take me as I am! My only plea—Christ died for me! Oh, take me as I am!
Helpless I am, and full of guilt; But yet for me Thy blood was spilt, And Thou canst make me what Thou wilt, And take me as I am.
No preparation can I make, My best resolves I only break, Yet save me for Thine own Name's sake, And take me as I am.
Behold me, Savior, at Thy feet, Deal with me as Thou seest meet; Thy work begin, Thy work complete, But take me as I am.
